name: PRISONER (itch) (Mr_error)
description:
W-forward

S-backward

A-left

D-right

E-to open door

Spacebar-jump/enter the portal

ESC-quit 

This prototype was just i execute my own idea. Assets ,fx, terrain are own and some materials are download in the help of Megascans. using the assets in this game LOD0 so game size is big i upload the executable files that can run in your machine.
